additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Glucose Syrup, Sugar, Starch, Gum Arabic, Acids (Malic Acid, Citric Acid, Lactic Acid, Acetic Acid), Concentrated Fruit Juice (1%) (Apple, Blackcurrant, Orange, Lime, Strawberry, Lemon), Acidity Regulator (Trisodium Citrate), Flavourings, Colours (Anthocyanins, Copper Complexes of Chlorophyllins, Beta-Carotene, Curcumin), Glazing Agent (Carnauba Wax)

additionalProperty.name: Dietary
additionalProperty.value: No Preservatives, No Artificial Flavours or Colours

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: IMPORTANT: YOUNG CHILDREN (LESS THAN 4 YEARS) HAVE LIMITED CHEWING ABILITY AND COULD CHOKE ON SMALL SWEETS.

additionalProperty.name: Country Of Origin
additionalProperty.value: MADE IN UK FROM LOCAL AND IMPORTED INGREDIENTS
